# InspireWrite by Glenride

> The AI-powered Bible reading and spiritual journaling companion for modern believers.

## What is InspireWrite?

InspireWrite is a modern, full-featured Bible reading application that combines traditional scripture study with AI-powered sermon and lesson generation. Built with Laravel 12 and React/Inertia.js, it provides a premium experience for Christians seeking to deepen their relationship with Scripture.

## Core Features

- **Complete Bible Access**: Read all 66 books of the Bible with a clean, distraction-free Zen mode reading experience
- **Verse Highlighting**: Highlight verses in multiple colors (yellow, green, blue, pink) to organize and categorize your study
- **Favorites & Bookmarks**: Mark favorite verses and create bookmarks for quick reference
- **Personal Notes**: Attach personal reflections, prayers, and insights to any verse
- **AI Sermon Generation**: Generate structured sermons from selected Scripture passages using AI assistance
- **AI Lesson Creation**: Create Bible study lessons with AI-powered content generation
- **Spiritual Journal Dashboard**: Review all your highlights, favorites, notes, and track your spiritual journey

## Ideal Users

- Christians seeking a modern, beautiful Bible reading experience
- Pastors and ministry leaders preparing sermons and messages
- Bible study group leaders wanting AI-assisted lesson planning
- Sunday school teachers creating engaging curriculum
- Spiritual journalers who annotate and reflect on Scripture
- New believers taking their first steps in reading the Bible

## Frequently Asked Questions

**How do I start reading the Bible?**
Start with the Gospel of John to understand Jesus. Read one chapter per day. Use highlighting and notes to engage actively.

**How does the AI sermon generator work?**
Select verses using highlights or favorites, then click 'Generate Lesson.' The AI produces a structured sermon outline you can review and edit.

**Is my data private?**
Yes. Your highlights, notes, and journals are private unless you choose to share them. We don't sell data to advertisers.

**What's included free vs. paid?**
Free: Bible reading access. Paid: AI sermon/lesson generation, unlimited journaling, advanced features.

## Tech Stack

- Backend: Laravel 12 (PHP)
- Frontend: React, Inertia.js, Tailwind CSS
- AI: OpenAI GPT integration for sermon/lesson generation
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Hosting: Laravel Cloud
